title: List of Kosher Restaurants | Mekor 3
headings: That Sushi Spot - LKWD NJ lakewood
text: Skip to Main Content Membership Events Donate Kiddush Center City Beit Midrash Join Us Davening Who We Are Kosher Restaurants More Support Mekor Kosher Restaurants Philadelphia is blessed to have a growing number of Kosher establishments. Our listings are provided for information purposes only: check the current certifying agency before visiting. If you find the information in this page to be inaccurate, please contact us. Click Here Center City Restaurants 20th Street Pizza Vegan Pizzeria (IKC Supervision) 108 S 20th St (215) 398-5748 Bar Bombon Vegan Food with Latin Flavors (IKC Supervision) 133 S. 18th Street (267) 606-6612 Note: Alcoholic beverages are NOT under supervision; list of approved alcoholic beverages available at restaurant upon request. Cafe 613 at Temple Hillel University Cafeteria (Keystone K Supervision) 1441 W Norris St (215) 777-9797 Charlie Was a Sinner Vegan Restaurant and Bar (IKC Supervision) 131 S 13th St (267) 758-5372 Note: Alcoholic beverages are NOT under supervision; list of approved alcoholic beverages available at restaurant upon request. Dining Commons at Penn Hillel University Dining Hall (Keystone K Supervision) ​215 S 39th Street (215) 573-7596 Fitz on 4th Vegan Tapas (IKC Supervision) 743 S. 4th St. (215) 315-8989 ​Note: Alcoholic beverages are NOT under supervision. Goldie ​Vegan Falafel Shop (IKC Supervision) (267) 239-0777 >Midtown Village 1218 Sansom St. > The Harper 1911 Sansom St. > Whole Foods Food Court 2101 Pennsylvania Ave. > Franklin's Table Food Hall 3401 Walnut St. >Fishtown 1601 North Front St. ​Note: Alcoholic beverages are NOT under supervision; list of approved alcoholic beverages available at restaurant upon request. Grassroots Food Truck Vegetarian/Vegan Restaurant (Keystone K Supervision) (267) 804-6132 Varying Location (mainly near the University of Pennsylvania campus) HipCityVeg Vegan Fast Casual (IKC Supervision 3 Locations > 127 S. 18th Street (215) 278-7605 > 121 South Broad Street ​(267) 296-9001 > ​214 S.40th Street (267) 244-4342​ Luhv Vegan Food (IKC Supervision) 2 locations > Luhv Deli at Reading Terminal Market 12th & Arch Streets > Luhv Vegan Bistro 1131 S. 19th St ​ Miss Rachel's Pantry ​Vegan Restaurant & Catering (IKC Supervision) - 1938 S Chadwick St​ (215) 798-0053 - 108 S 20th St (215) 398-5748 Note: Alcoholic beverages are NOT under supervision. Restaurant Bakery Ice Cream Cafe Zevi’s Bakery Casa Borinqueña​ Say She Ate Café Kosher Corner at Temple University New York Bagel Bakery That Sushi Spot - LKWD NJ lakewood Mekor Habracha Center City Synagogue (215) 525-4246 admin@mekorhabracha.org ​ 1500 Walnut St Suite 206 Philadelphia, PA 19102 SUBSCRIBE TO OUR WEEKLY NEWSLETTER Enter your email here SUBSCRIBE Latest Newsletters Copyright ©2025 by Mekor Habracha Synagogue
